verses.verse: Be you therefore <S%G3767><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> as dear <S%G27><s%> children; <S%G5043><s%>

And walk <S%G4043><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> has loved <S%G26><s%> us, and has given <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for us an offering <S%G4376><s%> and a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for a sweet smelling <S%G2175><s%> smell. <S%G3744><s%>

But fornication, <S%G4202><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> let it not be once <S%G3366><s%> named <S%G3687><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, as becomes <S%G4241><s%> saints; <S%G40><s%>

Neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> filthiness, <S%G151><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> foolish <S%G3473><s%> talking, <S%G3473><s%> nor <S%G2228><s%> jesting, <S%G2160><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are not convenient: <S%G433><s%> but rather <S%G3123><s%> giving of thanks. <S%G2169><s%>

For this <S%G5124><s%> you know, <S%G1097><s%> that no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3756><s%> fornicator, <S%G4205><s%> nor <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> person, nor <S%G2228><s%> covetous <S%G4123><s%> man, who <S%G3739><s%> is an idolater, <S%G1496><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> any inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> and of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G538><s%> you with vain <S%G2756><s%> words: <S%G3056><s%> for because <S%G1223><s%> of these <S%G5023><s%> things comes <S%G2064><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> on the children <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience. <S%G543><s%>
Be not you therefore <S%G3767><s%> partakers <S%G4830><s%> with them.

For you were sometimes <S%G4218><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> are you light <S%G5457><s%> in the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> as children <S%G5043><s%> of light: <S%G5457><s%>
(For the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is in all <S%G3956><s%> goodness <S%G19><s%> and righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and truth; <S%G226><s%>)
Proving <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
And have no <S%G3361><s%> fellowship <S%G4790><s%> with the unfruitful <S%G175><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> but rather <S%G3123><s%> reprove <S%G1651><s%> them.
For it is a shame <S%G149><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> things which are done <S%G1096><s%> of them in secret. <S%G2931><s%>

But all <S%G3956><s%> things that are reproved <S%G1651><s%> are made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> by the light: <S%G5457><s%> for whatever <S%G3956><s%> does make <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> is light. <S%G5457><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> Awake <S%G1453><s%> you that sleep, <S%G2518><s%> and arise <S%G450><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall give you light. <S%G2017><s%>
See <S%G991><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that you walk <S%G4043><s%> circumspectly, <S%G199><s%> not as fools, <S%G781><s%> but as wise, <S%G4680><s%>
Redeeming <S%G1805><s%> the time, <S%G2540><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> are evil. <S%G4190><s%>
Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> be you not unwise, <S%G878><s%> but understanding <S%G4920><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is.
And be not drunk <S%G3182><s%> with wine, <S%G3631><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> is excess; <S%G810><s%> but be filled <S%G4137><s%> with the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

Speaking <S%G2980><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%> in psalms <S%G5568><s%> and hymns <S%G5215><s%> and spiritual <S%G4152><s%> songs, <S%G5603><s%> singing <S%G103><s%> and making <S%G5567><s%> melody <S%G5567><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

Giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> things to God <S%G2316><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>
Submitting <S%G5293><s%> yourselves one <S%G240><s%> to another <S%G240><s%> in the fear <S%G5401><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Wives, <S%G1135><s%> submit <S%G5293><s%> yourselves to your <S%G3588><s%> own <S%G2398><s%> husbands, <S%G435><s%> as to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For the husband <S%G435><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of the wife, <S%G1135><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of the church: <S%G1577><s%> and he is the savior <S%G4990><s%> of the body. <S%G4983><s%>

Therefore <S%G235><s%> as the church <S%G1577><s%> is subject <S%G5293><s%> to Christ, <S%G5547><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> let the wives <S%G1135><s%> be to their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> thing.

Husbands, <S%G435><s%> love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G1438><s%> wives, <S%G1135><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the church, <S%G1577><s%> and gave <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for it;
That he might sanctify <S%G37><s%> and cleanse <S%G2511><s%> it with the washing <S%G3067><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> by the word, <S%G4487><s%>

That he might present <S%G3936><s%> it to himself <S%G1438><s%> a glorious <S%G1741><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> not having <S%G2192><s%> spot, <S%G4696><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wrinkle, <S%G4512><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> thing; but that it should be holy <S%G40><s%> and without <S%G299><s%> blemish. <S%G299><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> men <S%G435><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> their wives <S%G1135><s%> as their own <S%G1438><s%> bodies. <S%G4983><s%> He that loves <S%G25><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

For no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> ever <S%G4218><s%> yet hated <S%G3404><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> flesh; <S%G4561><s%> but nourishes <S%G1625><s%> and cherishes <S%G2282><s%> it, even <S%G2532><s%> as the Lord <S%G2962><s%> the church: <S%G1577><s%>
For we are members <S%G3196><s%> of his body, <S%G4983><s%> of his flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and of his bones. <S%G3747><s%>

For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G473><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> and mother, <S%G3384><s%> and shall be joined <S%G4347><s%> to his wife, <S%G1135><s%> and they two <S%G1417><s%> shall be one <S%G3391><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
This <S%G5124><s%> is a great <S%G3173><s%> mystery: <S%G3466><s%> but I speak <S%G3004><s%> concerning <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> and the church. <S%G1577><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> let every <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> one of you in particular <S%G3588><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> love <S%G25><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> even <S%G5613><s%> as himself; <S%G1438><s%> and the wife <S%G1135><s%> see that she reverence <S%G5399><s%> her husband. <S%G435><s%>
